result.reason: Current Multi SSH toolbar is single-line and does not handle multi-line pastes; adding this capability allows users to execute script snippets across multiple sessions efficiently.
result.approach: Modify `MultiSshToolStrip.cs` to intercept the `Ctrl+V` (Paste) event in `ProcessKeyPress`. Check if the clipboard contains text with newlines. If so, split the text by newlines and iterate through the lines, sending each line's characters followed by an Enter key command (`NativeMethods.WM_KEYDOWN`, 13) to all active connections via `SendAllKeystrokes`.
